recipe_name: Chicken tacos with green pepper salsa
author: Mike Robinson
method: In a deep pan, sauté the chicken in a little oil until just cooked.  Add the beans and onion, chilli and garlic and some chopped coriander.  Add the lemon juice and season, and then mix in a little sour cream.   In another bowl, mix the salsa ingredients together.  To serve, spoon the chicken mix into the taco shells and add some salsa. Dollop a little more sour cream inside, garnish with the cucumber, grated cheddar and red onion, and eat with gusto!
ingredients: 2 chicken breasts, cut into thin strips,  1 can of drained and washed cannellini beans,  1 red onion, thinly sliced,  1 red chilli, chopped,  1 clove garlic, crushed,  small bunch of coriander, chopped ,  ½ lemon, juice only,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  100ml/3½fl oz sour cream,  4 taco shells,  3 plum tomatoes, de-seeded and chopped,  1 red chilli, chopped,  1 green pepper, finely chopped,  ½ red onion,  ½ lemon, juice only,  1 tbsp olive oil,  50g/2oz cucumber, finely sliced,  50g/2oz cheddar, grated,  ½ red onion, diced
